mapper.insert: insert into t_published_coupon (published_code, coupon_code, user_id) values ('PC' || lpad(T_PUBLISHED_COUPON_SEQ.nextval, 6,0), #{couponCode}, #{userId})

insert into t_published_coupon (published_code, coupon_code, user_id) select ('PC' || lpad(T_PUBLISHED_COUPON_SEQ.nextval, 6,0)), e.coupon_code, ev.user_id from t_event_join ev, t_event e where ev.event_code = e.event_code and e.coupon_code = #{value} and ev.event_join_result = 'Y'
mapper.update: update t_published_coupon set published_used = 'Y', published_used_date = sysdate where published_code = #{value}
